org.opendaylight.controller.controllermanager.northbound

Class ControllerManagerNorthbound

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.controllermanager.northbound.ControllerManagerNorthbound

  • public class ControllerManagerNorthbound
extends java.lang.Object
    The class provides Northbound REST APIs to manager the controller. Currently it supports getting controller property(ies), setting a property, and removing a property

    • Constructor Summary

      ControllerManagerNorthbound()

      • getControllerProperties

        public ControllerProperties getControllerProperties(java.lang.String containerName,
                                           java.lang.String propertyName,
                                           java.lang.String queryString)
        Retrieve a property or all properties for the controller in the network
        Parameters:
        containerName - Name of the Container (Eg. 'default')
        propertyName - Name of the Property specified by Property and its extended classes Example: Request URL: http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/controllermanager/default/properties/?propertyName=macAddress Response Body in XML: 3e:04:ef:11:13:80 Response Body in JSON: { "controllerProperties": {"properties": { "macAddress": { "value": "3e:04:ef:11:13:80" } } } }

      • setControllerProperty

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response setControllerProperty(@Context
                                              javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                              java.lang.String containerName,
                                              java.lang.String propertyName,
                                              java.lang.String propertyValue)
        Add a controller property to the controller. This method overrides previously set property values if the property already exist.
        Parameters:
        containerName - Name of the Container (Eg. 'default')
        propertyName - Name of the Property specified by Property and its extended classes
        propertyValue - Value of the Property specified by Property and its extended classes
        Returns:
        Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code Example: Request URL: http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/controllermanager/default/properties/description/defaultController

      • removeControllerProperty

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeControllerProperty(java.lang.String containerName,
                                                 java.lang.String propertyName)
        Delete a property of the controller
        Parameters:
        containerName - Name of the Container (Eg. 'default')
        propertyName - Name of the Property specified by Property and its extended classes
        Returns:
        Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code Example: Request URL: http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/controllermanager/default/properties/description

      • saveConfiguration

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response saveConfiguration()
